alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued December 14 at 4:16PM EST until December 17 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Some roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Significant shoreline erosion is likely. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The areas most likely to see lakeshore flooding and significant beach erosion will be those exposed to a south-southwest wind.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
